channel.title: [Resolved] Update SDG Targets & Indicators Links on Sector Vocabulary
channel.description:
The official list of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) including targets and indicators is now published (in downloadable format) at http://unstats.un.org/sdgs/indicators/indicators-list/
Therefore the URL for code 8 ' SDG Target' and code 9 'SDG Indicator' on the [Sector Vocabulary](http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/SectorVocabulary/) codelist should be amended to reference the above UNSTATs link.

item.title: [Resolved] Update SDG Targets & Indicators Links on Sector Vocabulary
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.source: [Resolved] Update SDG Targets & Indicators Links on Sector Vocabulary
